name: Disable Windows Security Center Notifications
description: Detect set UseActionCenterExperience to 0 to disable the windows security center notification
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*SOFTWARE\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\UX\ Configuration\\Notification_Suppress AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000001\))`
